text:
KEA | Bay Area | NLP, Telephony, Signal Processing | Full-time, onsite | Python / Haskell

KEA is a voice platform that answers phone calls, understands customer intent and converts it automatically into orders sent to the business POS. No more waiting on hold to order your pizza!

We are looking for Haskell / Python 3 folks for building NLU systems. Email us at emily@kea.ai

https://kea.ai
